posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
I created a new forum dedicated to game guides, by which I mean guides to the various aspects of the NWN game be them classes/PRCs, races, general character building, playing strategies, build types, spells and spell usage, etc.

All are invited to take up the challenge to write up a guide, but those that do so are kindly asked to not underestimate the task and to make an effort to make the guide a useful resource for all that will read it. By this I mean to keep it well formatted, clear, to the point and to avoid unnecessary biases or specific environment references.

All questions, clarifications, suggestions and whatnot regarding the new forum, be pleased posted here in this thread.


Thank you all.

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
RE: "whatnot"...

A great idea, illustrious one! The guild is gradually becoming a one-stop-shopping venue for serious builders and casual visitors alike. Me likes.
